title: Installation issue: berkeley-db does not build with NVIDIA HPC compilers 20.7
body:
Hello,

berkeley-db fails to build with NVIDIA HPC compilers 20.7 on Red Hat 8.1:
```
"/usr/include/c++/8/bits/atomic_base.h", line 210: error: identifier
          "__GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL" is undefined
      { return __i ? __GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL : 0; }
                     ^

"/usr/include/c++/8/bits/atomic_base.h", line 210: error: identifier
          "__GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL" is undefined
      { return __i ? __GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL : 0; }
                     ^

1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-berkeley-db-18.1.40-6erllnclft3wqyjq3jbefp6ifiqg3lj6/spack-src/lang/cxx/cxx_channel.cpp".
make: *** [Makefile:2796: cxx_channel.lo] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
"/usr/include/c++/8/bits/atomic_base.h", line 210: error: identifier
          "__GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL" is undefined
      { return __i ? __GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL : 0; }
                     ^

1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-berkeley-db-18.1.40-6erllnclft3wqyjq3jbefp6ifiqg3lj6/spack-src/lang/cxx/cxx_db.cpp".
make: *** [Makefile:2798: cxx_db.lo] Error 1
"/usr/include/c++/8/bits/atomic_base.h", line 210: error: identifier
          "__GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL" is undefined
      { return __i ? __GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL : 0; }
                     ^

1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-berkeley-db-18.1.40-6erllnclft3wqyjq3jbefp6ifiqg3lj6/spack-src/lang/cxx/cxx_dbc.cpp".
make: *** [Makefile:2800: cxx_dbc.lo] Error 1
1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-berkeley-db-18.1.40-6erllnclft3wqyjq3jbefp6ifiqg3lj6/spack-src/lang/cxx/cxx_dbstream.cpp".
make: *** [Makefile:2802: cxx_dbstream.lo] Error 1
1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-berkeley-db-18.1.40-6erllnclft3wqyjq3jbefp6ifiqg3lj6/spack-src/lang/cxx/cxx_dbt.cpp".
make: *** [Makefile:2804: cxx_dbt.lo] Error 1
1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-berkeley-db-18.1.40-6erllnclft3wqyjq3jbefp6ifiqg3lj6/spack-src/lang/cxx/cxx_env.cpp".
make: *** [Makefile:2806: cxx_env.lo] Error 1
```

I have seen that @samcmill recently commited a change that addresses an issue with nvhpc and CentOS 7 that could be similar:
https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/bb00b1a7c9eae3d307f0a22dcccae9e33a5885d0/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/berkeley-db/package.py#L44-L47

I tried to widen the condition so that `--disable-atomicsupport` is used for Red Hat 8 too but I still have the same issue so maybe it is not related at all.

Any thoughts regarding this?

Best,
Rémi
